#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstring>
#include <cmath>

#include <iostream>
#include <iterator>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>

using namespace std;

#define C 1001

char human[C], alien[C];

int alphabet[30] = {0};
bool a[30] = {false};
bool h[30] = {false};

int main()
{
	scanf("%s %s", human, alien);
	int hlen, alen;
	hlen = strlen(human);
	alen = strlen(alien);
	
	sort(human, human + hlen);
	sort(alien, alien + alen);
	
	for (int i = 0; i < alen; i++)
		a[ alien[i] - 'a' ] = true;
	
	for (int i = 0; i < hlen; i++)
	{
		if (! a[ human[i] - 'a' ])
		{
			alphabet[ human[i] - 'a' ]++;
			h[ human[i] - 'a' ] = true;
		}
	}
	
	for (int i = 0; i < 30; i++)
		if (h[i])
			printf("%c%d", 'a'+i, alphabet[i]);
	cout << endl;
	return 0;
}
